newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israeli wounded in shooting on bus in West Bank.
newsitem.headline: Israeli wounded in shooting on bus in West Bank.

text.p: Israel Radio said on Wednesday gunmen fired at an Israeli bus travelling near a Jewish settlement south of the West Bank town of Bethlehem, wounding one person.
"There is a gunshot victim near the settlement of Neve Daniel...one wounded in an Israeli bus," the radio said.
The condition of the wounded person was not immediately clear and the radio said ambulances had arrived at the scene.
Israel army radio said it was unclear whether the shots were fired from a passing vehicle or in an ambush. It said searches were under way.
No one has claimed responsibility for the shooting at the Israeli commuter bus.
Arab guerrillas in July shot and killed three Israelis in a drive-by attack within Israel.
